scripts.build-prod: bun scripts/prepare.ts && bun build --target=node ./src/index.ts --outfile=dist/index.js --external commander --external dotenv --external inquirer --external knex --external pg --external mysql2 --external fs-extra --external nanospinner --external inflection --external archiver --minify
scripts.link-cli: bun unlink && bun run build-prod && chmod +x ./dist/index.js && bun link
scripts.deploy: bun run build-prod && npm publish --access public
